instructions.en: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl and mix well
instructions.sk: Zmiešajte všetky ingrediencie v malej miske a dobre premiešajte
instructions.ja: 小さなボウルに全ての材料を入れてよく混ぜる

instructions.en: To use: Brown 1 pound ground beef and drain. Add seasoning mixture with 1/2 cup water and 1-2 tablespoons Taco Bell Restaurant Hot Sauce (optional). Simmer for 5-10 minutes
instructions.sk: Použitie: Opečte 500 g mletého hovädzieho mäsa a sceďte. Pridajte zmes korenia s 120 ml vody a 1-2 lyžicami Taco Bell Restaurant Hot Sauce (voliteľné). Varte na miernom ohni 5-10 minút
instructions.ja: 使用方法：牛ひき肉450gを炒めて油を切る。調味料ミックスと水120ml、タコベルレストランホットソース大さじ1〜2（任意）を加え、5〜10分煮込む
